move_slider_in_out.description: Move the slider in, then out

wipe_clean_slider.description: Clean the slider to keep it hygienic and smooth

move_in_wipe_slider.description: Move the slider in and clean it

check_slider_movement.description: Slide in and out the slider, clean it, and slide it again for a thorough check

move_slider_in_single_step.description: Move the slider in by one step

move_out_slider_single_step.description: Move the slider out by one step

triangle_step_slider.description: Move the slider in, out, and then in again

wipe_slider_step.description: Clean the slider gently to ensure it is in good working conditions

in_out_wipe_slider.description: Move the slider in, out and then clean the slider

move_slider_in.description: Move the slider in to change the switch options.

move_slider_out.description: Move the slider out to change the switch options.

double_press_slider.description: Press the slider twice to ensure it maintains its responsiveness.

clean_and_check_slider.description: Clean the slider and after cleaning, check if it can be moved smoothly by moving it in and then out.

slide_in_slider.description: Slide in the slider to adjust the switch settings.

slide_out_slider.description: Slide out the slider to adjust the switch settings.

press_slider.description: Press the slider to turn on or off the switch.

clean_slider.description: Clean the slider of the switch to ensure smooth operation.

push_slider_in_step.description: Push the slider in by one step

pull_slider_out_step.description: Pull the slider out by one step

in_out_in_slider.description: Move the slider in, out, and then in again

slide_and_clean_slider.description: Slide the slider in and then clean it

push_in_pull_out_clean_slider.description: Push the slider in, pull out and then clean the slider

clean_switch_frame.description: Clean the switch frame to maintain its appearance

press_clean_frame.description: Press the frame and clean it

press_and_clean_frame.description: Press the switch frame to see if it is stable and then clean it

wipe_switch_frame.description: Clean the switch frame to remove dust or unwanted marks

press_switch_frame.description: Press the switch frame to check the stability.

clean_frame.description: Clean the switch frame to maintain its appearance and remove debris.

press_frame_check_stability.description: Press the switch frame to ensure it's steady and secure.

check_clean_slider_frame.description: Clean the slider and frame, move the slider in and out for a complete check

overall_switch_check.description: Press the frame, clean the frame and slider, and move the slider in and out for a total test

clean_switch_whole.description: Clean the entire switch including both the frame and slider

check_slider_and_frame.description: Clean the slider and frame, and then move the slider in and out

press_and_slide.description: Press the switch frame to see if it is stable and then move the slider in and out

full_check_and_clean.description: Press the switch frame, clean the frame and slider, and then move the slider in and out

clean_and_check_all.description: Clean both the slider and the switch frame, then move the slider in and out to check if it works properly.

clean_all.description: Clean both the slider and switch frame to ensure smooth operation.

check_switch_functionality.description: Slide in and out the slider and then clean the entire switch to check the functionality.

clean_whole_switch.description: Clean the entire switch including the switch frame and slider.

routine_maintenance.description: For routine maintenance, first clean the switch frame and slider, then slide the slider two steps in and one step out.

functionality_inspection.description: To inspect the switch's functionality, first clean the switch frame and slider, press the switch frame, and then slide the slider in and out.

clean_and_test.description: Clean both the switch frame and slider, then slide the slider in and out to test its performance.
